text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: Pyotr Petrovitch, anxious in Petersburg>
<optional narration, >Questions swarm in his mind.

Pyotr: What power do they really have?  

Pyotr: Am I safe here?  

Pyotr: Can I win them over?  

---  

<setup: Andrey Semyonovitch, proud yet unassuming>
<optional narration, >Appearance contrasts with his confidence.

Andrey: My ideas are crucial for progress!  

Andrey: They respect me, you know.  

Andrey: Just look at my whiskers!

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch is anxious about the influence of the younger generation and seeks to navigate their potential power while relying on the simple-minded Andrey Semyonovitch for guidance.
